text: in 2012 i was just the fourth software
engineer to join a stealth mode startup
called annapurna labs
a few years later we were acquired by
amazon web services
if anyone thought at the time that this
might slow us down
they were wrong
at an opponent labs our philosophy has
always been to empower software
engineers to innovate
and that remains true today only at a
much larger scale
today i am a senior software design
engineer at an apollo labs aws
israel the most exciting part of my job
when the new chip first arrives in the
lab
usually within a week you already get
the feeling of
how the new chip works and you can feel
history being made
if i had to describe aws in three words
world's biggest startup
you
